key.name: jira-url
key.description: Base URL of your Jira instance (e.g., https://company.atlassian.net)

key.name: jira-email
key.description: Email address for your Jira account

key.name: jira-token
key.description: API token for authenticating with Jira

key.name: issue-format
key.description: Format string for displaying issues ({key}, {summary} available)

key.name: no-issues-text
key.description: Text to display when no issues are found

key.name: homepage-url
key.description: URL to open when no issues are found or for "Show All Issues". Can be full URL (https://...) or relative path (/jira/your-work). Leave empty to use main Jira URL.
